Name: Celestial Convergence
Story Background: As the sun reaches its zenith, the celestial spirits are summoned to bring about a powerful convergence of energies.
Ability: Exile target permanent. If that permanent's mana value is 3 or less, its controller gains life equal to its mana value.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a celestial being surrounded by a swirling vortex of radiant energy, reaching out to touch a fading object that is being banished into nothingness.
